name: Boxing Fighter : Super punch
description: Get ready to rumble with this action packed arcade style boxing game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.8 GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: 2.4 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 500 series or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
